_metadata._comment: notification-config.json ‚Äî Message templates, motivation pools, and dynamic placeholder definitions for all notification types.
_metadata._comment_2: IMPORTANT DISTINCTION: notification-global-config.json controls WHEN and HOW notifications fire.
_metadata._comment_3: THIS file controls WHAT notifications say ‚Äî titles, body templates, message pools.
_metadata._comment_4: All user-facing string values are i18n keys. Never raw strings.
_metadata._comment_5: Dynamic placeholders use {placeholder_name} syntax in templates.
_metadata._comment_6: Placeholder values are resolved at runtime by NotificationTemplateResolver service.
_metadata._comment_7: Each notification type has: title_key, body_template_key, placeholders, and where applicable a message_pool.
_metadata._comment_8: Message pools are arrays of i18n keys. One is selected randomly unless rotation_strategy overrides.
_metadata._comment_9: Templates and pools are extended in language ARB files ‚Äî this file holds the keys, ARB files hold the text.

template_engine._comment_2: This service is responsible for resolving i18n keys, substituting placeholders, and selecting from pools.
template_engine._comment_syntax: Placeholders in templates use curly brace syntax. e.g. 'Time for your {task_name}'.
template_engine._comment_key: If an i18n key is missing in active language, fall back to English ARB value.
template_engine._comment_rotation: Options: 'random' | 'sequential' | 'weighted'. Random avoids repetition feeling predictable.
template_engine._comment_repeat: Track last N used pool items in user_preferences to avoid showing same message consecutively.
template_engine._comment_count: Prevent the last 3 used pool messages from being selected again.

placeholders._comment: Master reference of all available placeholders and their runtime resolution sources.
placeholders._comment_2: NotificationTemplateResolver reads this to know where to fetch each placeholder value.

task_name._comment: The app task name from master-tasks-config.json.

task_custom_title._comment: User-defined custom title for the task. May be null.

task_display_name._comment: Resolved display name: custom_title if set, else task_name. Used in most templates.

task_time._comment: Scheduled time of the task. Formatted per active language time format.

task_date._comment: Scheduled date. Formatted per active language date format.

user_name._comment: User's display name if set. Falls back to empty string gracefully.

points_balance._comment: User's current points balance computed from audit log.

points_to_next_milestone._comment: Points needed to reach the next premium threshold.

next_milestone_points._comment: The actual points number of the next milestone e.g. 300.

next_milestone_months._comment: Premium months awarded at next milestone e.g. 3.

snooze_until_time._comment: The time a snoozed task will next fire.

weather_condition._comment: Primary weather condition from last API response e.g. 'rain', 'sunny', 'cloudy'.

weather_temperature._comment: Current temperature in Celsius from last API response.

pollen_level._comment: Pollen level from last API response e.g. 'high', 'very_high'.

uv_index._comment: UV index from last API response.

vehicle_make._comment: Vehicle make from DVLA response e.g. 'Ford', 'Toyota'.

mot_expiry_date._comment: MOT expiry date from DVLA response.

tax_due_date._comment: Road tax due date from DVLA response.

streak_days._comment: Consecutive days with at least one task completion. Reserved for future streak feature.

task_reminder._comment: Standard task reminder notification ‚Äî fires at scheduled task time (minus remind-me offset).
task_reminder._comment_2: Message resolution order: task_custom_message ‚Üí user_custom_title + task_name ‚Üí task_name_only.

title._comment: i18n key for notification title. e.g. 'Task Reminder' or app name.

with_custom_message._comment: Used when task has a custom notification message in master-tasks-config.json.

with_custom_title._comment: Used when user has set a custom task title but no custom message exists.

task_name_only._comment: Fallback. Used when no custom message and no custom title.

task_reminder._comment_actions: Notification action buttons allow task completion/snooze without opening app.

missed_task._comment: Notification fired when task time passes without completion.
missed_task._comment_2: Fires at intervals configured in notification-global-config.json: 10m, 30m, 2h.

first_reminder._comment: Fired at 10 minutes after missed time.
first_reminder.example_resolved: You missed Laundry at 09:00 ‚Äî still time to do it!

second_reminder._comment: Fired at 30 minutes after missed time.
second_reminder.example_resolved: Laundry from 09:00 is still waiting for you.

final_reminder._comment: Fired at 2 hours after missed time.
final_reminder.example_resolved: Last chance ‚Äî Laundry has been waiting since 09:00.

body._comment_interval: Key = interval index matching delay_intervals_minutes array in notification-global-config.json.

morning_summary._comment: Daily morning summary ‚Äî fires 60 minutes after wake-up time.
morning_summary._comment_2: Includes motivational message + today's tasks. Multi-time tasks grouped.
